Description:
JLL supports the Whole You, personally and professionally.Our people at JLL are shaping the future of real estate for a better world by combining world class services, advisory and technology to our clients. We are committed to hiring the best, most talented people in our industry; and we support them through professional growth, flexibility, and personalized benefits to manage life in and outside of work.  Whether you’ve got deep experience in commercial real estate, skilled trades, and technology, or you’re looking to apply your relevant experience to a new industry, we empower you to shape a brighter way forward so you can thrive professionally and personally.Role PurposeWe are currently looking for Senior Quantity Surveyor/Cost Manager with a Commercial background to be based in Jeddah to work on a range of high-profile property sector projects across the KSA.What this job involvesPreparation of Budget estimates. 

Preparation of Bills of Quantities. 

Monthly payment valuations. 

Preparation of Final Accounts (under supervision).

Preparation of contract Documents. Reviewing and negotiating prices with Contractors. 

Review costing’s in conjunction with budgets.

Price and check additional works as required and complete relevant paperwork. 

Attending site meetings. 

Attending design team meetings.Contract Management:Review, negotiate, and manage contracts with clients, subcontractors, and suppliers to ensure compliance with legal and commercial requirements.

Collaborate with the legal team to draft and review contractual terms and conditions, ensuring they are favorable to the company's interests.

Monitor contract performance, identify and mitigate potential risks, and make recommendations for contract amendments when necessary.Cost ControlDevelop and maintain accurate project cost estimates, budgets, and financial models.

Implement cost control measures and ensure adherence to established budgets throughout the project lifecycle.

Conduct regular cost analysis, identify cost-saving opportunities, and recommend strategies to optimize project profitability.Stakeholder ManagementBuild and maintain strong relationships with clients, subcontractors, suppliers, and other external stakeholders.

Collaborate with project teams to ensure smooth communication and alignment of commercial objectives.

Provide guidance and support to project managers and teams to ensure commercial considerations are integrated into project planning and execution.Desired skills and experience for this Bachelor's degree in QS, Business Administration, Finance, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).

Proven experience in a similar role or in a related commercial management position within the construction industry.

Strong financial acumen and experience in budgeting, cost control, and financial analysis.

Excellent negotiation and contract management skills.

In-depth knowledge of construction industry practices, regulations, and legal requirements.

Proficient in using financial software and tools, such as ERP systems and project management software.

Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build strong relationships with stakeholders at all levels.

Strong leadership abilities, with a track record of successfully leading and developing high-performing teams.

Hardworking, proactive individual with a strong desire to learn and progress with an eye for detail and a passion for high standards.  Location:If this job description resonates with you, we encourage you to apply even if you don’t meet all of the requirements.  We’re interested in getting to know you and what you bring to the table!About JLL –For over 200 years, JLL (NYSE: JLL), a leading global commercial real estate and investment management company, has helped clients buy, build, occupy, manage and invest in a variety of commercial, industrial, hotel, residential and retail properties. A Fortune 500 company with annual revenue of $20.9 billion and operations in over 80 countries around the world, our more than 103,000 employees bring the power of a global platform combined with local expertise.
